Name: Light of Reignition (I)
Desc: At the start of every wave or Cycle, randomly applies a debuff for <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak></color> time(s), selected from the following: Reduce ATK by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>, reduce DEF by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>, reduce SPD by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>, reduce Effect RES by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>, or increase the received follow-up attack DMG by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#5[i]%</unbreak></color>. Each debuff can stack up to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak></color> time(s) and lasts for <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak></color> turn(s). At the same time, enables 1 ally following either the Path of The Hunt or Path of Destruction to immediately take action.

Challenge.Name: Win with at least <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Cycle(s) left
Win with at least <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Cycle(s) left
Have no downed characters
